contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Zottegem |picture= |picture-legend= |map=MnpZottegemLocation.png |map-legend=Location of Zottegem in East Flanders |arms=Blason ville be Zottegem.svg |flag=Flag of Zottegem.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Aalst|Aalst]] |nis=41081 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor= Herman De Loor (sp.a) |majority=[[sp.a]], [[Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams|CD&V]] |postal-codes=9620 |telephone-area=09 |web=[http://www.zottegem.be/ www.zottegem.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=52 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=48 }} '''Zottegem''' ({{IPA-nl|ˈzɔtəɣɛm|-|}}) is a [[municipality]] located in Belgium and more particularly in [[Flanders]], in the province of [[East Flanders]]. The municipality comprises the town of Zottegem proper and the villages of [[Elene (village)|Elene]], [[Erwetegem]], [[Godveerdegem]], [[Grotenberge]], [[Leeuwergem]], [[Oombergen]], [[Sint-Goriks-Oudenhove]], [[Sint-Maria-Oudenhove]], [[Strijpen]] and [[Velzeke-Ruddershove]]. On January 1, 2006 Zottegem had a total population of 24,548. The total area is 56.66 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 433 inhabitants per km². Zottegem is crossed by two brooks, the [[Molenbeek (Erpe-Mere Bovenschelde)|Molenbeek]] in Grotenberge and Leeuwergem, as well as the [[Molenbeek-Ter Erpenbeek]] in Godveerdegem, Erwetegem, and Grotenberge. With its beautiful nature Zottegem is part of the geographical area Vlaamse Ardennen ([[Flemish Ardennes]]) and the [[Denderstreek]]. There is also a little village in Zottegem [[Bevegem]] that was never a municipality before. ==Famous inhabitants== *[[Lamoral, Count of Egmont]], general and statesman, is buried in Zottegem *[[Patricia de Martelaere]] (b. in Zottegem), writer *[[Magali Uytterhaegen]] (b. in Zottegem), actress ([[The_Curiosity_of_Chance|The curiosity of Chance]]) ==Places of interest== <gallery> Image:Zottegem - City hall 1.jpg|<center>Town Hall</center> Image:Zottegem - Onze-Lieve-Vrouw Hemelvaartkerk 1.jpg|<center>Church of the Assumption of Our Lady</center> Image:Zottegem - Former deanery 1.jpg|<center>The former Deanery</center> Image:Zottegem - Egmontkasteel 1.jpg|<center>Egmont Castle</center> Image:Lamoraal van Egmont 12-09-2009 17-27-11.JPG|<center>Statue of [[Lamoral, Count of Egmont]]</center> Image:Zottegem - Brouwerij Crombé 1.jpg|<center>Crombé Brewery</center> File:Zottegem - Duivelsvoetstap.jpg|<center>The "Duivelsvoetstap" (Devil's footprint) </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Commonscat}} ==External links== *[http://www.zottegem.be Official website ] - Information available in Dutch and limited information available in English, French and German {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] [[Category:Zottegem]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
